creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: color image of a newspaper clipping with a photograph of Angela Merkel on top of a book with a reproduction of a painting by Peter Ilsted of a woman reading in a sparsely-furnished room
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: [Angela Merkel and Peter Ilsted painting]
